description: Inclusive teaching means teaching in ways that do not exclude students, accidentally or intentionally, from opportunities to learn.  The Alexa skill includes tips on web accessibility of online classrooms and teaching methods in physical spaces.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask teaching craft to tell me something.
Alexa, ask teaching craft for a tip.
Alexa, ask teaching craft for the full tour
imageAltText: Teaching Craft: Tips for Inclusive Learning icon
name: Teaching Craft: Tips for Inclusive Learning
shortDescription: Learn about inclusive teaching through tips about web accessibility, active learning, and peer-reviewed research on evidence-based excellence in teaching.
